VERIFING_SUBTITLE: Complete CAPTCHA below to join the group chat.
PASSED_DESC:
You can find the group chat you just joined in chat list.
If you cannot see it, try restart your Telegram client.
ERROR_DESC:
There is an error: {errmsg}
Please re-apply to the group and try again.
ERRCODE_CAPTCHA_NOT_PASSED: your CAPTCHA had not be passed
LANGUAGE_TEST: You are now using English (US) language environment.
